item.title: About
item.description: Hi, I am Maria I am a Coach, a Trainer and a Mindfulness Teacher. I am a woman who walks with women towards conquering the life they want. I firmly believe that, with the right support, we can achieve anything we set our minds to. I am here to support you. I have a Master of Science in Computer Science, am a Master NeuroMindfulnessÂ© Coach Practitioner, and am a professional Associate Professional Coach with the International Coaching Federation (ICF).
